name: Santosh Dongre
story: I’m Manu Singh from a small village in Uttar Pradesh, where I help my brother manage our family’s farmland. Farming is more than a livelihood for us – it’s our legacy. Earlier, we struggled with outdated equipment and hard manual labor. Since we started using Captain Tractor, everything changed. It’s powerful, easy to handle, and saves us.
